class.name: UtilityAIBTLeaf
class.brief_description: Used for conditions and actions. You should define your own [code]on_tick()[/code] method where you do your logic.
class.description: The leaf node is used for conditions and actions. You should define your own [code]on_tick()[/code] method where you do your logic. You can also define the method with the name [code]tick()[/code] but this is only available for backwards compatibility to version 1.4. You can either return the tick result or set the [member UtilityAIBehaviourTreeNodes.tick_result] property. Examples: [gdscript] func on_tick(blackboard, delta) -> int: return 1 [/gdscript] [gdscript] func on_tick(blackboard, delta): tick_result = 1 [/gdscript]
